name: TeamCardSix
description: Team member card with full-bleed image background and blurred gradient overlay with name and role text at bottom.

description.example: The talented people behind our success

name.note: Team member name displayed at 2xl font-medium with truncate in blurred overlay

role.note: Role/title displayed at base size with truncate in blurred overlay

imageSrc.note: Image path for team member photo (full-bleed with rounded-theme-capped)

imageAlt.note: Alt text for image (defaults to member name if not provided)

propsSchema.members: Array<{ id: string, name: string, role: string, imageSrc: string, imageAlt?: string }>
propsSchema.gridVariant: 'uniform-all-items-equal' | 'bento-grid' | 'bento-grid-inverted' | 'asymmetric-60-wide-40-narrow' | 'three-columns-all-equal-width' | 'one-large-right-three-stacked-left' | 'items-top-row-full-width-bottom' | 'full-width-top-items-bottom-row' | 'one-large-left-three-stacked-right' (required - determines grid layout or carousel trigger)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <TeamCardSix members={[{ id: '1', name: 'Sarah Johnson', role: 'CEO & Founder', imageSrc: '/team/sarah.jpg' }, { id: '2', name: 'Michael Chen', role: 'CTO', imageSrc: '/team/michael.jpg' }]} gridVariant="uniform-all-items-equal" animationType="slide-up" title="Meet Our Team" description="The talented people behind our success" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} tag="Team" tagIcon={Users} />
